title: Seldon
description: At Seldon, we’re connected. To an innovative community. And to the future of data science itself. We’re driven with a passionate belief in enabling ever better AI – sitting within a trusted, stable framework. And we constantly look ahead.   We enable some of the world’s leading businesses to accelerate the adoption of large scale machine learning to help solve their most pressing challenges and shape the future.  In 2017 we created Seldon Core, our second open-source release, which has grown into one of the world’s most popular machine learning platforms. Today, Seldon Core has over 100k installs and our fast-growing global network is founded on a community of AI specialists across 90 countries. Our contributors, customers and partners include the largest and most innovative companies in finance and technology.
